transcript:
Customer: Namaste ji ka swagat hai IndiaMART mein.
Executive: Ek ek minute do. Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes sir.
Customer: Haan ji Yashika mam Yashika mam abhi jaise maine aapko bheja tha na door frame metal director agar aap isme bhi search karoge to na koi by lead nahi aayegi iski.
Executive: Haan so ye product aapka different hai ab jo maine search kiya door frame metal matlab door metal director wo alag hai.
Customer: Wo alag product hai mam usme aap dekhoge na wo product hi difference aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan maine dusra kya hai na ki actually jo hum sale kar rahe hain na uski koi by lead hi nahi aa rahi hai matlab aap ye dekh lo.
Executive: Hmm hmm wahi abhi ye wale product ki search karne me nahi aa rahi hai. 
Customer: Mam kuch kuch glitch ho raha hai isme na aisa to nahi hai mam iski to millions of matlab meri dusri id hai aap usme agar dekhoge to itni bahut sari by lead to ab hamare isme lead nahi aa rahi jiska hum jisme hum iski payment kar rahe hain to aisa kyun gap aa raha hai ye.
Executive: Hmm hmm wahi main thoda aur ek value aur bhi hai main aapko bata deta hu aap na do se teen point mere ko by lead nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Sort out karke dena hamare paas hota kya hai jaise koi lead aati hai na jaise hum usko consume karna chahte hain wo mujhe already dikha deta hai ki ye already use ho chuki hai.
Executive: Sold out.
Customer: Ab wo ek haan ek minute bhi nahi hota usko ki wo sold out ho jati hai.
Customer: To aise to aise kaise wo to wo to possibilities hai kyunki ho sakta hai ki ji aapki jo product hai uske liye to kam aati hai aur jo bhi aapke mam maine ek dedicated person baitha rakha hai jo system ko har do minute ke andar refresh kar raha hai aur jaise hi koi lead aa rahi hai usko consume kar raha hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Past lead mein hamare paas hamare jo product hai uski sari leads aa rahi hai.
Customer: Lekin by lead ke andar ek bhi lead nahi aa rahi hai to ye to opposite nahi ho gaya sochiye jahan par already wo exhaust ho chuki hai waha pe lead show kar raha hai lekin hamare by lead ke andar ek bhi lead nahi aa rahi same product ki aap is cheez dekhiyega jo past lead hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Us section ke andar sare product hi wahi hai jo hum sale kar rahe hain.
Executive: Haan kyunki maine usme maine bhi check kari thi wo sari cheeze maine matlab gunjan ko bataya tha ki aapki jo product hai uski leads aa rahi hai but wo ek dam se sold out ho jati hai like abhi ek minute pehle lead aayi thi ye abhi aap pehle meri baat suniye main 20 leads by leads ki payment de raha hu aapko weekly.
Customer: Mere paas agar aap aap pehle meri baat suniye main 20 leads by leads ki payment de raha hu aapko weekly.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai mere paas jo leads aa rahi hai wo ek bhi consume nahi kar pa raha hu main aur mere paas irrelevant leads aa rahi hai aur main aapse ek cheez discuss kar raha hu ye cheez kyun ho rahi hai aur aap mujhe answer de rahe ho ki bhai ye aisa hai ki aise hi hota hai mam ye aise kaise solution hoga fir.
Executive: Main iske liye sir main dekhti hu ki main kya kar sakti hu because abhi ek minute pehle ek lead aayi thi door frame metal director ki aayi thi abhi just ek minute pehle aayi hai Noida Gautam Buddha Nagar aur wo sold out ho gayi aate hi.
Customer: Aap past lead mein check kariye open kiya hua hai to aapne mam main to wahi dekh raha hu na aap aap hi samajhiye dekhiye ek zero second pehle bhi aayi hai aap mujhe ye lo main aapko screenshot deta hu ye lijiye ab zero second mein hum kaise usko consume kare mujhe aap ye batao ye to matlab ek tarike se wo ho gaya ki ghuma rahe hain matlab faltu mein na ki hum dikha rahe hain but aisa kuch hai nahi aap ye dekho isme zero second likha hua hai.
Customer: Ab isko main kaise consume karu fraction of second mein to mam koi bhi kam nahi kar payega.
Executive: Ye wali to abhi sold out hui hai haan abhi mere ko ek minute time time dekho na mam kitna usme zero second aa raha hai.
Executive: Hmm mujhe to abhi kaise kaise consume kare mam isko aap mujhe batao.
Executive: Aur ye to already sold out hai waise bhi.
Customer: Sold out to hai ye to mam mere ko sirf pata kya lag raha hai ki sirf showsha baji ke liye aap log dikha rahe ho ki bhai hamare paas leads aati hai but aise koi leads aa hi nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm aisa to possibilities kyunki to pura mam possibilities hai maine to pure teen mahine se abhi main yahi dekh raha hu ek bhi lead mujhe aise nahi consume hui jo mere ko lagta ho ki mere liye profitable hai aap ye samajhiye maine ek investment kari hai agar mujhe usse respond nahi aayega to mere liye to zero hai na wo sari cheeze.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapki apne according aap ek person dedicated is kam ke liye lagaya hua hai jo is pe working kar raha hai but waha se bhi ye respond aa raha hai ki ji hume leads hi nahi mil rahi hai wo aapse support lete hain wo ye bol aap unko jo support dete hain wo yahi batate ho ki ji past lead mein milegi aapko jaldi jaldi karna padega jaldi kaise kare usme fraction of second mein to na aap kar paoge na main kar paunga.
Executive: Nahi sir wo main samajh rahi hu aapki baat main isko ek bar apni side se analyze karti hu apne manager se bhi discuss karti hu ho sakta hai isme bhi koi glitch ho account mein aap na ek na mere main aapko na ek mail id de raha hu ye aap na ek mail type karo aur apne jo bhi aapki technical team hai unse loop mein lo aur unse same question ask karo ki bhai ye cheeze aa rahi hai aur maine screenshot aapko sare ke sare diye hue hain aap mere ko bhi loop mein lo aur mere ko bhi pata lage ki kya process chal raha hai kyunki dekhiye mam main pehle sari cheeze na ek gunjan mam ke upar hi thi gunjan mam aaj last unhone mujhe bata diya ki mujhe koi respond nahi mil raha yashika mam se main already discuss kar chuki hu to wo fed up ho chuki hai wo ab is pe working nahi karengi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Acha theek hai aaj maine isko khol ke dekha ab main isko constantly main khud isko watch out karunga aur theek hai as per account manager ye aapki responsibility hai isko solution dena.
Executive: Yeah definitely sir it's my responsibility.
Customer: Haan ji to aap please maine aapko apna mail address drop kiya hai aap ek mail root karo jisme aap mere ko bhi loop in mein rakho aur mujhe bhi pata lage kya process hai aur kyun kis wajah se ye ho raha hai iske andar do se teen points aap na ye cheez add kariyega ki hamare relevant ads hame relevant leads nahi aa rahi hai jo leads aa rahi hai wo past leads mein show ho rahi hai wo aur hamare ko jo product chahiye wo product ki leads ek bhi nahi aa rahi hai matlab agar main search bhi kar raha hu to bhi nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: To aap please ye sare concern ko raise kariye fir then hum discuss karte hain by lead isme kya karna hai.
Executive: Hmm yes sir first because discussion hai ek bar main apne manager se discuss kar leti hu maybe wo isko matlab kar paye then main aapko inform karti hu uske accordingly theek hai padhi to main unse aapko meeting arrange kara dungi ek.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ha mam meeting nahi mam actually main dekhiye main full day engaged rahunga to aap please na mere ko jo bhi aap answer hoga ya to aap mere ko pehle mujhe whatsapp de dijiyega aur fir secondly mail pe dijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai okay sir.
Executive: Alright Yashika.
Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- No buyleads for the product being sold.

- Leads shown as 'already used' immediately.

- Irrelevant leads received despite payment.

- Past leads show products being sold.

- No leads in buylead for same product.



Resolution:

- Executive will analyze the issue.

- Executive will discuss with manager.

- Executive will loop in technical team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a mail with concerns.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, leads, product, technical issue, payment
